summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2131 for the improvement of Union Street, from First Avenue to Hubbell Way, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, all in the City of Seattle, by the installation of a system of cluster lights along the curb line of each of said streets and avenues, together with the installation of such poles, conduits and wires as may be necessary for the proper installation and equipment of said system; under Ordinance No. 21375, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
